levelName: 英文單字認讀基礎級(七)

examples.english: How will you go to the new museum next week?
examples.chinese: 你下週會如何去新的博物館呢？

examples.english: How was your school trip to the farm last month?
examples.chinese: 你上個月的農場校外教學如何？

examples.english: Can you tell me how to draw a cute cat step by step?
examples.chinese: 你能告訴我如何一步一步畫出可愛的貓嗎？

examples.english: Where are you going for your next school trip?
examples.chinese: 你下次校外教學要去哪裡？

examples.english: This is the park where we will have our picnic.
examples.chinese: 這就是我們要野餐的公園。

examples.english: Can you tell me where the nearest bus stop is?
examples.chinese: 你能告訴我最近的公車站牌在哪裡嗎？

examples.english: Which book will you read first for your report?
examples.chinese: 你會先讀哪一本書來寫你的報告？

examples.english: The park which has a big slide is my favorite.
examples.chinese: 那個有大溜滑梯的公園是我最喜歡的。

examples.english: She helped her friend, which was very kind of her.
examples.chinese: 她幫助了她的朋友，這對她來說非常友善。

examples.english: My family will meet me here at the park.
examples.chinese: 我的家人將會在公園這裡和我見面。

examples.english: Please put your backpack right here on the chair.
examples.chinese: 請把你的背包放在椅子這裡。

examples.english: We can build our fort here in the forest.
examples.chinese: 我們可以在森林裡這裡蓋我們的堡壘。

examples.english: Your backpack is over there, by the door.
examples.chinese: 你的背包在那裡，在門旁邊。

examples.english: We can walk there together to play games after lunch.
examples.chinese: 我們午餐後可以一起走到那裡玩遊戲。

examples.english: The new library will be built over there next year.
examples.chinese: 那座新圖書館明年會在那裡蓋起來。

examples.english: We will play games in the classroom this afternoon.
examples.chinese: 我們今天下午將在教室裡玩遊戲。

examples.english: My family will visit Taipei in December.
examples.chinese: 我的家人將在十二月拜訪臺北。

examples.english: Please write your name in big letters on the paper.
examples.chinese: 請將你的名字用大寫字母寫在紙上。

examples.english: The cat will sleep on the soft blanket later.
examples.chinese: 貓咪等一下會睡在那條柔軟的毯子上。

examples.english: He will put a new picture on the wall.
examples.chinese: 他會把一張新照片貼在牆上。

examples.english: They will ride their bikes on the path in the park.
examples.chinese: 他們會在公園裡的小徑上騎腳踏車。

examples.english: I will meet you at the library after class tomorrow.
examples.chinese: 我明天下課後會在圖書館和你見面。

examples.english: Next week, our class will have a concert at the auditorium.
examples.chinese: 下週，我們班會在禮堂舉辦音樂會。

examples.english: My brother usually plays computer games at his friend's house.
examples.chinese: 我哥哥通常在他朋友家玩電腦遊戲。

examples.english: The train will travel under the long tunnel tomorrow.
examples.chinese: 火車明天將會從長隧道下經過。

examples.english: The students will finish their project under the teacher's guidance next week.
examples.chinese: 學生們下週將會**在**老師的指導**之下**完成他們的專案。

examples.english: Children under five years old can enter the park for free.
examples.chinese: 五歲**以下**的兒童可以免費進入公園。

examples.english: This special gift is from my aunt in America.
examples.chinese: 這個特別的禮物是來自我在美國的阿姨。

examples.english: From next week, we will have English class every day.
examples.chinese: 從下週開始，我們每天都會有英文課。

examples.english: This chair is made from recycled plastic bottles.
examples.chinese: 這張椅子是用回收的塑膠瓶製成的。

examples.english: We will go out to play in the park later.
examples.chinese: 我們等一下會到外面去公園玩。

examples.english: Please take the trash out after dinner tonight.
examples.chinese: 請你今晚晚餐後把垃圾拿出去。

examples.english: My mom is out now, but she will return later.
examples.chinese: 我媽媽現在不在家，但她等一下會回來。

examples.english: We will wait for you outside the classroom after school.
examples.chinese: 我們放學後會在教室外面等你。

examples.english: Please put your shoes outside the door before entering the house.
examples.chinese: 請在進門前把鞋子放在門外。

examples.english: Look at the beautiful patterns on the outside of the old vase.
examples.chinese: 看看那個舊花瓶外側美麗的圖案。

examples.english: We will play the game by the new rules.
examples.chinese: 我們將會根據新規則來玩這個遊戲。

examples.english: By my clock, the movie starts in five minutes.
examples.chinese: 根據我的時鐘，電影將在五分鐘後開始。

examples.english: They will finish the project by the teacher's schedule.
examples.chinese: 他們會根據老師的進度表完成這個專案。

examples.english: I study hard every day for a bright future.
examples.chinese: 我每天努力讀書，為了光明的未來。

examples.english: My brother bought a pretty gift for his best friend.
examples.chinese: 我哥哥買了一份漂亮的禮物，為了他最好的朋友。

examples.english: They practice soccer every week for the big game next month.
examples.chinese: 他們每週練習足球，為了下個月的那場大比賽。

examples.english: We will go to the library to study after school.
examples.chinese: 我們放學後會去圖書館讀書。

examples.english: She will send a nice card to her friend next week.
examples.chinese: 她下週會寄一張漂亮的卡片給她的朋友。

examples.english: Everyone should listen carefully to the principal's speech.
examples.chinese: 大家應該仔細聆聽校長的演講。

examples.english: I will go to the park with my dog tomorrow.
examples.chinese: 我明天會和我的狗一起去公園。

examples.english: We will write a letter with a new pen.
examples.chinese: 我們會用一支新筆寫一封信。

examples.english: My mom will bake a cake with a lot of chocolate.
examples.chinese: 我媽媽會烤一個加了許多巧克力的蛋糕。

examples.english: My brother and I will visit the zoo next Saturday.
examples.chinese: 我的哥哥和我下週六將會去參觀動物園。

examples.english: He will read a book and go to bed early tonight.
examples.chinese: 他今晚會讀一本書和早點上床睡覺。

examples.english: Study hard, and you will get good grades next semester.
examples.chinese: 努力讀書，而且你下學期會得到好成績。

examples.english: I want to go to the park, but it will rain later.
examples.chinese: 我想去公園，但是等一下會下雨。

examples.english: The math problem looks easy, but it has a trick.
examples.chinese: 這道數學題看起來很簡單，但是它有一個陷阱。

examples.english: He wanted to play outside, but he had to finish homework first.
examples.chinese: 他想在外面玩，但是他必須先完成功課。

examples.english: You should wear warm clothes when it gets cold outside tomorrow.
examples.chinese: 明天外面變冷時，你應該穿保暖的衣服。

examples.english: We will buy some new clothes for our family trip next month.
examples.chinese: 我們下個月會為家庭旅行買一些新衣服。

examples.english: These are my favorite clothes; they are very comfortable and pretty.
examples.chinese: 這些是我最喜歡的衣服；它們非常舒服又漂亮。

examples.english: You will need a warm coat when we visit the snowy mountains next month.
examples.chinese: 下個月當我們去雪山時，你會需要一件暖和的大衣。

examples.english: My mom is going to buy me a new waterproof coat for my birthday next week.
examples.chinese: 我媽媽下週將會買一件新的防水大衣給我當作生日禮物。

examples.english: Don't forget your coat; it will be very windy after school today.
examples.chinese: 別忘了你的大衣；今天放學後風會很大。

examples.english: I will wear my warm jacket because it's cold outside today.
examples.chinese: 我今天會穿我的暖和夾克，因為外面很冷。

examples.english: Tomorrow, I will wear my red jacket to school for sports day.
examples.chinese: 明天，我會穿我的紅色夾克去學校參加運動會。

examples.english: Please hang your jacket in the closet when you come home.
examples.chinese: 當你回家時，請把你的夾克掛在衣櫃裡。

examples.english: My favorite blue pants feel very comfortable to wear. (我最喜歡的藍色褲子穿起來非常舒服。)
Tomorrow, I will buy new long pants for my school trip. (明天，我會為我的校外教學買新的長褲。)
He needs to wear dark pants for the performance next week. (下週的表演他需要穿深色褲子。)
My new blue T-shirt has a cool dinosaur picture on it.
examples.chinese: 我的新藍色T恤上面有一張很酷的恐龍圖案。

examples.english: I will wear my favorite T-shirt to the school picnic tomorrow.
examples.chinese: 我明天會穿我最喜歡的T恤去學校野餐。

examples.english: You should wear a clean T-shirt for your sports class today.
examples.chinese: 你今天上體育課應該穿一件乾淨的T恤。

examples.english: When summer comes, I will often wear my favorite shorts.
examples.chinese: 當夏天來臨時，我會常常穿我最喜歡的短褲。

examples.english: My brother always wears his sports shorts when he plays basketball.
examples.chinese: 我哥哥打籃球時，總是穿他的運動短褲。

examples.english: I hope to buy a new pair of denim shorts for my school trip next month.
examples.chinese: 我希望下個月為校外教學買一件新的牛仔短褲。

examples.english: She will wear a beautiful red skirt to the party.
examples.chinese: 她會穿一件漂亮的紅色裙子去派對。

examples.english: My sister wants a new skirt for her dance performance.
examples.chinese: 我的姐姐想要一件新裙子來參加她的舞蹈表演。

examples.english: Every girl in our class has a blue skirt for the school uniform.
examples.chinese: 我們班上每個女生都有一件藍色裙子當作校服。

examples.english: My brother will wear a new blue shirt to school tomorrow.
examples.chinese: 我哥哥明天將會穿一件新的藍色襯衫去學校。

examples.english: She needs a special formal shirt for the school performance.
examples.chinese: 她需要一件特別的正式襯衫來參加學校表演。

examples.english: Don't forget to put your dirty shirt into the laundry basket.
examples.chinese: 別忘了把你的髒襯衫放進洗衣籃裡。

examples.english: My sister will wear a beautiful blue dress to the party tonight.
examples.chinese: 我的姐姐今晚將會穿一件漂亮的藍色洋裝去派對。

examples.english: We should dress quickly so we don't miss the bus.
examples.chinese: 我們應該快點穿好衣服，這樣才不會錯過公車。

examples.english: For the school play, we will dress up as different animals.
examples.chinese: 為了學校的戲劇表演，我們將會打扮成不同的動物。

examples.english: She will choose a pair of bright yellow socks for the party.
examples.chinese: 她會為派對挑選一雙亮黃色的襪子。

examples.english: He quickly took off his wet socks after playing in the rain.
examples.chinese: 他在雨中玩耍後，很快地脫下了濕襪子。

examples.english: These sports socks are designed to absorb sweat well during exercise.
examples.chinese: 這些運動襪設計成在運動時能很好地吸收汗水。

examples.english: I will wear my new blue shoes to the park tomorrow.
examples.chinese: 我明天會穿我的新藍色鞋子去公園。

examples.english: These special running shoes will help me run faster in the race.
examples.chinese: 這雙特別的跑鞋會幫助我在比賽中跑得更快。

examples.english: Remember to take off your dirty shoes before you enter the house.
examples.chinese: 記得在進屋子前把你的髒鞋子脫掉。

examples.english: My sister will comb her long hair before school tomorrow.
examples.chinese: 我的姊姊明天上學前會梳她的長髮。

examples.english: You will need a comb to fix your messy hair quickly.
examples.chinese: 你會需要一把梳子來快速整理你凌亂的頭髮。

examples.english: I will gently comb my cat's fur after its bath.
examples.chinese: 我的貓咪洗完澡後，我會輕輕地梳牠的毛。

examples.english: I will bring a reusable bag for grocery shopping tomorrow.
examples.chinese: 我明天會帶一個環保袋去買菜。

examples.english: He put his textbooks and pencil case into his school bag.
examples.chinese: 他把課本和鉛筆盒放進他的書包裡。

examples.english: Please put the empty snack wrappers in the small plastic bag.
examples.chinese: 請把空的零食包裝袋放進那個小塑膠袋裡。

examples.english: He will wear his new baseball hat when we go to the park.
examples.chinese: 他去公園時會戴他的新棒球帽。

examples.english: My sister's favorite hat is red with a cute little flower.
examples.chinese: 我姊姊最喜歡的帽子是紅色的，上面有一朵可愛的小花。

examples.english: Every student needs to wear a special hat for the school play.
examples.chinese: 每個學生都需要為校園戲劇戴一頂特別的帽子。

examples.english: If it rains, I will take my umbrella to school.
examples.chinese: 如果下雨，我會帶我的雨傘去學校。

examples.english: She used her umbrella to protect herself from the hot sun.
examples.chinese: 她用她的雨傘保護自己免受炎熱的太陽。

examples.english: My new colorful umbrella will keep me dry in the heavy rain.
examples.chinese: 我的新彩色雨傘會讓我在大雨中保持乾燥。

examples.english: Eating healthy food helps your body grow strong.
examples.chinese: 吃健康的食物幫助你的身體長得強壯。

examples.english: Your body can run fast and jump high.
examples.chinese: 你的身體可以跑很快，跳很高。

examples.english: After a long day, your body needs to rest.
examples.chinese: 漫長的一天後，你的身體需要休息。

examples.english: Remember to brush your teeth before bed tonight.
examples.chinese: 記得今晚睡覺前要刷牙。

examples.english: Sharks have many sharp teeth for catching fish.
examples.chinese: 鯊魚有許多鋒利的牙齒用來捕捉魚。

examples.english: If you eat too much candy, your teeth will get cavities.
examples.chinese: 如果你吃太多糖果，你的牙齒會蛀牙。

examples.english: This morning, I noticed one of my front teeth felt a little loose.

examples.chinese: 今天早上，我發現我前面有一顆牙齒有點鬆動。

examples.english: My brother had a cavity in his back tooth, so the dentist fixed it.

examples.chinese: 我哥哥後面有一顆蛀牙，所以牙醫幫他補好了。

examples.english: When I was seven, I lost my first baby tooth.

examples.chinese: 我七歲的時候，掉了我的第一顆乳牙。

examples.english: He hurt his back when he fell down.
examples.chinese: 他跌倒的時候傷到背部了。

examples.english: The little girl carried a heavy backpack on her back.
examples.chinese: 小女孩的背上背著一個很重的背包。

examples.english: It's important to keep your back straight when sitting.
examples.chinese: 坐著的時候，保持背部挺直很重要。

examples.english: He will stretch his neck to see the show better.
examples.chinese: 他會伸長脖子，好看清表演。

examples.english: The bottle has a long neck, making it easy to pour water.
examples.chinese: 這個瓶子有長長的瓶頸，讓倒水變得很容易。

examples.english: This T-shirt has a round neck; it's very comfortable to wear.
examples.chinese: 這件T恤有圓領，穿起來非常舒服。

examples.english: I will smile widely, showing my happy lips.
examples.chinese: 我會開心地大笑，露出我快樂的嘴唇。

examples.english: My lips feel dry, so I will use lip balm.
examples.chinese: 我的嘴唇感覺很乾，所以我會擦護唇膏。

examples.english: Please fill the cup almost to the lip.
examples.chinese: 請把杯子裝到快要滿到邊緣。

examples.english: You use your index finger to point at things.
examples.chinese: 你用你的食指來指東西。

examples.english: He will finger the correct answer on the test paper.
examples.chinese: 他會用手指點出考卷上的正確答案。

examples.english: Please don't finger the exhibits in the museum.
examples.chinese: 請不要用手指觸摸博物館裡的展品。

examples.english: I will use my strong foot to kick the soccer ball next game.
examples.chinese: 我下一場比賽會用我有力的腳踢足球。

examples.english: This tall tree is over fifty feet high and very old.
examples.chinese: 這棵高大的樹有超過五十英尺高，而且非常老了。

examples.english: We will meet at the foot of the big mountain tomorrow morning.
examples.chinese: 我們明天早上會在這座大山的腳下見面。

examples.english: Tomorrow will be a very busy day for us at school.
examples.chinese: 明天在學校對我們來說會是非常忙碌的一天。

examples.english: We usually play outside during the day when the sun is shining.
examples.chinese: 太陽出來時，我們通常在白天到外面玩。

examples.english: One day, I hope to visit Japan and see many beautiful places.
examples.chinese: 有一天，我希望去日本參觀許多美麗的地方。

examples.english: Our class has a big test on Monday, so we need to study hard.
examples.chinese: $我們班星期一有一次大考，所以我們需要努力讀書。

examples.english: We usually have English class every Monday morning at school.
examples.chinese: $我們通常每個星期一早上在學校上英文課。

examples.english: My family will visit Grandma next Monday afternoon for her birthday.
examples.chinese: $我家人下星期一的下午會去探望奶奶，慶祝她的生日。

examples.english: Next Tuesday, our class will visit the science museum.
examples.chinese: 下星期二，我們班將會參觀科學博物館。

examples.english: Every Tuesday afternoon, I go to art class with my best friend.
examples.chinese: 每逢星期二下午，我都會和最好的朋友一起去上美術課。

examples.english: Our class trip to the zoo is scheduled for next Tuesday.
examples.chinese: 我們班去動物園的戶外教學行程安排在下星期二。

examples.english: Our class will visit the zoo next Wednesday.
examples.chinese: 我們班下週三會去參觀動物園。

examples.english: Every Wednesday, I have a special art class after school.
examples.chinese: 每個星期三，我放學後都有特別的美術課。

examples.english: Wednesday is my favorite day because we have sports class.
examples.chinese: 星期三是我最喜歡的一天，因為我們有體育課。

examples.english: Our class will have a big science test next Thursday.
examples.chinese: $ 我們的班級下星期四將會舉行一場大型的自然科學考試。

examples.english: Every Thursday morning, we go to the school library to read books.
examples.chinese: $ 每個星期四早上，我們都會去學校圖書館讀書。

examples.english: Last Thursday, we visited a beautiful museum with our teacher.
examples.chinese: $ 上星期四，我們和老師一起參觀了一間漂亮的博物館。

examples.english: We will have a special art class next Friday at school.
examples.chinese: $我們下星期五在學校會有一堂特別的美術課。

examples.english: Every Friday, I play basketball with my friends after school.
examples.chinese: $每個星期五放學後，我都會跟朋友打籃球。

examples.english: Friday is my favorite day because the exciting weekend starts soon!
examples.chinese: $星期五是我最喜歡的一天，因為令人興奮的週末很快就要開始了！

examples.english: This Saturday, my family and I will visit the zoo.
examples.chinese: 這週六，我和家人會去動物園玩。

examples.english: Every Saturday morning, I usually help my mom clean the house.
examples.chinese: 每個星期六早上，我通常會幫媽媽打掃房子。

examples.english: We will have an exciting school festival next Saturday.
examples.chinese: 我們下個星期六將會舉辦一場刺激的校園慶典。

examples.english: Next Sunday, our family will visit the zoo together.
examples.chinese: 下個星期日，我們一家人會一起去動物園。

examples.english: Every Sunday morning, my mom always makes delicious breakfast for us.
examples.chinese: 每到星期日早上，我媽媽總會為我們做美味的早餐。

examples.english: I will finish my homework on Saturday so I can play all day Sunday.
examples.chinese: 我會把功課在星期六寫完，這樣星期日就可以玩一整天。

examples.english: We will visit my grandma for one whole week. 我們會去探望奶奶一整個星期。
Next week, our class will visit the zoo and learn. 下個星期，我們班會去動物園參觀並學習。
I usually practice piano lessons at home twice a week. 我通常一個星期在家練習兩次鋼琴。
The weekend is a great time to relax with my family.
examples.chinese: 週末是和家人一起放鬆的好時光。

examples.english: I often ride my bike to the park on the weekend.
examples.chinese: 我週末常常騎自行車去公園。

examples.english: Next weekend, my family will go camping near the mountains.
examples.chinese: 下週末，我的家人將去山區露營。

examples.english: My family will go to Kenting next month for our summer vacation.
examples.chinese: 我的家人下個月會去墾丁度暑假。

examples.english: My grandparents will stay with us for a whole month during the holiday.
examples.chinese: 我的爺爺奶奶將在假期中和我們住一個月。

examples.english: There are twelve months in a year, and my birthday is in April.
examples.chinese: 一年有十二個月，我的生日在四月。

examples.english: My family will travel to Hualien next year.
examples.chinese: 我的家人明年會去花蓮旅行。

examples.english: Our school has a fun field trip every year.
examples.chinese: 我們學校每年都有一次有趣的校外教學。

examples.english: This year, I will learn to swim better than before.
examples.chinese: 今年，我會學會游得比以前更好。

examples.english: Every morning, I drink a glass of milk before school.
examples.chinese: 每天早上，我上學前會喝一杯牛奶。

examples.english: Tomorrow morning, we will have a special class at school.
examples.chinese: 明天早上，我們學校會有一堂特別的課。

examples.english: The sun is shining brightly this morning, so let's play outside.
examples.chinese: 今天早上陽光普照，所以我們出去外面玩吧。

examples.english: My sister and I will go to the library this afternoon.
examples.chinese: 我的姐姐和我今天午後要去圖書館。

examples.english: After school, I usually play basketball with my friends every afternoon.
examples.chinese: 放學後，我每天午後通常會和朋友打籃球。

examples.english: Our class will have a special outdoor activity tomorrow afternoon.
examples.chinese: 我們班明天午後會有一個特別的戶外活動。

examples.english: The beautiful sun will slowly set in the evening.
examples.chinese: 傍晚時，美麗的太陽會慢慢下山。

examples.english: My family will watch a movie together this evening.
examples.chinese: 今晚，我的家人會一起看電影。

examples.english: After school, I will do my homework in the early evening.
examples.chinese: 放學後，我會在傍晚時做我的功課。

examples.english: We will watch a movie together tonight.
examples.chinese: 我們今晚會一起看電影。

examples.english: My mom reads a story to me every night.
examples.chinese: 我媽媽每晚都會唸故事給我聽。

examples.english: Animals like owls usually hunt for food at night.
examples.chinese: 貓頭鷹等動物通常在晚上獵食。

examples.english: We have a special art class today at school.
examples.chinese: 我們今天在學校有一堂特別的美術課。

examples.english: After school, I will play soccer with my friends today.
examples.chinese: 放學後，我今天會和朋友一起踢足球。

examples.english: Please remember to bring your library books back today.
examples.chinese: 請記得今天把圖書館的書還回去。

examples.english: My family will eat dinner at a new restaurant tonight.
examples.chinese: 我的家人今天晚上將在一家新餐廳吃晚餐。

examples.english: The school basketball game is finally tonight, and I am so excited.
examples.chinese: 學校的籃球賽終於在今天晚上舉行，我好興奮！

examples.english: I hope my dad can tell us a story before bed tonight.
examples.chinese: 我希望爸爸今天晚上睡前可以跟我們說一個故事。

examples.english: Our class will go on a field trip tomorrow.
examples.chinese: 我們班明天要去校外教學。

examples.english: The weather forecast says it will be sunny tomorrow.
examples.chinese: 天氣預報說明天會是晴天。

examples.english: Are you free to play basketball with me tomorrow?
examples.chinese: 你明天有空跟我一起打籃球嗎？

examples.english: My family went to the park yesterday and had a good time.
examples.chinese: 我的家人昨天去了公園，玩得很開心。

examples.english: The teacher gave us a fun group project yesterday afternoon.
examples.chinese: 老師昨天下午給了我們一個有趣的團體專案。

examples.english: I finished my homework yesterday, so now I can relax.
examples.chinese: 我昨天把功課做完了，所以現在可以放鬆了。

examples.english: We will need more time to finish our group project.
examples.chinese: 我們會需要更多時間來完成我們的團體專題。

examples.english: Next time, we should go to the amusement park together.
examples.chinese: 下次，我們應該一起去遊樂園。

examples.english: What time will the movie start this evening?
examples.chinese: 電影今晚幾點會開始？

examples.english: Our English class will begin at nine o'clock tomorrow morning.
examples.chinese: 我們的英文課明天早上九點鐘會開始。

examples.english: What time will the library close today? Is it at six o'clock?
examples.chinese: 圖書館今天幾點會關門呢？是六點鐘嗎？

examples.english: Let's meet at the train station at three o'clock for our trip.
examples.chinese: 我們三點鐘在火車站會合，去旅行吧。

examples.english: Our school sports day will start at 8:00 a.m. next Saturday.
examples.chinese: 我們的學校運動會將在下週六上午八點開始。

examples.english: My mom always wakes up early, around 6:30 a.m., to make breakfast.
examples.chinese: 我媽媽總是在上午六點半左右起床，準備早餐。

examples.english: Please remember to submit your homework before 10:00 a.m. on Friday.
examples.chinese: 請記得在星期五上午十點前交作業。

examples.english: The movie will start at 2 p.m. this Saturday.
examples.chinese: 電影將在這週六下午兩點開始。

examples.english: We usually finish our homework by 5 p.m. every day.
examples.chinese: 我們每天通常在下午五點前完成作業。

examples.english: The park is open until 7 p.m. for everyone to enjoy the sunset.
examples.chinese: 公園開放到下午七點，讓大家可以欣賞夕陽。

examples.english: I am studying for my test now.
examples.chinese: 我現在正在為我的考試讀書。

examples.english: We should leave for the park now before it gets dark.
examples.chinese: 我們應該現在就去公園，趁天黑前。

examples.english: My brother could not swim last year, but now he is very good.
examples.chinese: 我哥哥去年還不會游泳，但是他現在游得很好。

examples.english: We had a fun class party last Friday afternoon.
examples.chinese: 我們上個星期五下午舉辦了一個有趣的班級派對。

examples.english: He was the last student to leave the classroom today.
examples.chinese: 他是今天最後一個離開教室的學生。

examples.english: This exciting sports game will last for about two hours.
examples.chinese: 這場刺激的體育比賽將會持續大約兩個小時。

examples.english: You will be late if you don't leave now for the bus.
examples.chinese: 如果你現在不走，搭公車就會晚了。

examples.english: We usually eat a late dinner on weekends because we play outside.
examples.chinese: 我們週末通常比較晚吃晚餐，因為我們都在外面玩。

examples.english: My brother often stays up late to finish his homework or read books.
examples.chinese: 我哥哥常常熬夜到很晚，為了完成功課或看書。

examples.english: Our class trip will go to the museum next week.
examples.chinese: 我們班的校外教學下週要去博物館。

examples.english: After we finish this game, what will we play next?
examples.chinese: 我們玩完這個遊戲後，接下來要玩什麼？

examples.english: We will learn about space in the next science class.
examples.chinese: 我們在下堂自然課會學習太空知識。

examples.english: Our new classroom is very big and bright with many windows. 我們的新教室很大很明亮，還有很多窗戶。
We will learn many interesting things in the classroom tomorrow. 我們明天會在教室裡學到許多有趣的事物。
Students always help to keep their classroom clean and tidy. 學生總是會幫忙把教室保持乾淨整齊。
My classmate and I often share our snacks during recess.
examples.chinese: 我的同學和我在下課時常常分享零食。

examples.english: We will all study together with our classmates for the final exam next week.
examples.chinese: 下週我們將和同學們一起為期末考準備。

examples.english: That new classmate from another school quickly made many friends here.
examples.chinese: 那位從其他學校來的新同學很快地在這裡交到了許多朋友。

examples.english: Students will draw a big picture on the blackboard tomorrow.
examples.chinese: 學生們明天將會在黑板上畫一幅大圖畫。

examples.english: Our classroom has a big green blackboard at the front.
examples.chinese: 我們教室前面有一塊大的綠色黑板。

examples.english: After class, a student will clean the blackboard carefully.
examples.chinese: 下課後，一位學生將會仔細地擦黑板。

examples.english: I will use my new notebook to write down important things in class.
examples.chinese: 我會用我的新筆記本在課堂上寫下重要的事。

examples.english: This small notebook has many colorful pages for drawing pictures.
examples.chinese: 這個小筆記本有很多彩色頁面可以畫畫。

examples.english: Don't forget to bring your English notebook tomorrow morning.
examples.chinese: 明天早上別忘了帶你的英文筆記本。

examples.english: I will draw a beautiful picture on this piece of paper.
examples.chinese: 我會在這張紙上畫一幅漂亮的圖畫。

examples.english: Tomorrow, we will take a science exam paper in class.
examples.chinese: 明天，我們會在課堂上考一張自然科試卷。

examples.english: My mom will read the morning paper to know the news.
examples.chinese: 我媽媽會看早報來了解新聞。

examples.english: This picture of a flying dragon looks very powerful.
examples.chinese: 這幅飛龍的圖畫看起來非常有力。

examples.english: We will take many wonderful pictures at the beach next summer.
examples.chinese: 明年夏天我們會在海邊拍許多很棒的照片。

examples.english: Can you find the hidden picture of a cat in this storybook?
examples.chinese: 你能在這本故事書裡找到那張藏起來的貓咪圖畫嗎？

examples.english: I will study English very hard to travel abroad next year.
examples.chinese: 我明年會非常努力地學習英文，以便出國旅行。

examples.english: You will need to speak English if you want to order food overseas.
examples.chinese: 如果你想在國外點餐，你會需要說英文。

examples.english: Our class will read an interesting English storybook together tomorrow.
examples.chinese: 我們班明天會一起讀一本有趣的英文故事書。
